MUTHUR.welcome:
MUTHUR 6000 v2.1.0
TERMINAL ACTIVE...
INTERFACE 2037
AWAITING COMMAND...
MUTHUR.help:
AVAILABLE COMMANDS:
- HELP: DISPLAY THIS HELP
- STATUS: SYSTEM STATUS
- CLEAR: CLEAR SCREEN
- EXIT: CLOSE TERMINAL
- /M [MESSAGE]: COMMUNICATE WITH MUTHUR
 
AWAITING COMMAND...
MUTHUR.status:
MUTHUR 6000 v2.1.0
ALL SYSTEMS FUNCTIONAL
NO ANOMALIES DETECTED
MUTHUR.commandNotFound: COMMAND NOT RECOGNIZED. TYPE 'HELP' FOR COMMAND LIST.
MUTHUR.newSessionStarted:
=== NEW MUTHUR SESSION STARTED ===
HERE ARE THE AVAILABLE COMMANDS FOR THE PLAYER:
HELP: DISPLAY THIS HELP
STATUS: SYSTEM STATUS
CLEAR: CLEAR SCREEN
EXIT: CLOSE TERMINAL
/M [MESSAGE]: COMMUNICATE WITH MUTHUR
HACK: INITIATE HACK COMMAND FOR ADMINISTRATOR RIGHTS
SPECIAL ORDER: 754, 899, 931, 937, 939, 966, DISPLAY SPECIAL ORDERS
CERBERUS PROTOCOL: COMMAND TO INITIATE SELF-DESTRUCT
MUTHUR.unknownCommand: COMMAND NOT RECOGNIZED. TYPE 'HELP' FOR COMMAND LIST
MUTHUR.sessionActiveWarning: A MUTHUR session is already active with {userName}
MUTHUR.selectCharacterHint: Choose the character who will communicate with MUTHUR

useTokenName.name: Use Character Name
useTokenName.hint: Use character name instead of player name in messages

typewriter.name: Typewriter Effect
typewriter.hint: Enables progressive text display like in the Alien movie

commandsList.name: MU/TH/UR Commands List
commandsList.hint: Complete list of available commands for players:
commandsList.commands:
HELP: DISPLAY THIS HELP
STATUS: SYSTEM STATUS
CLEAR: CLEAR SCREEN
EXIT: CLOSE TERMINAL
MOTHER [MESSAGE]: COMMUNICATE WITH MUTHUR
HACK: INITIATE HACK COMMAND FOR ADMINISTRATOR RIGHTS
SPECIAL ORDER: 754, 899, 931, 937, 939, 966, DISPLAY SPECIAL ORDERS
CERBERUS PROTOCOL: COMMAND TO INITIATE SELF-DESTRUCT

hackResult.name: Hack Result
hackResult.hint: Determines if hack attempts succeed or fail with the HACK command

typingSound.name: Typing Sounds
typingSound.hint: Enables keyboard typing sounds like in the Alien movie

typingSoundVolume.name: Typing Volume
typingSoundVolume.hint: Adjusts typing sound volume (0 = mute, 1 = maximum)

motherResponseColor.name: MOTHER Response Color
motherResponseColor.hint: Sets the color of MOTHER's response messages

scanline.name: Scanline Effect
scanline.hint: Enables the light scanning effect before text display

scanlineSize.name: Scanline Size
scanlineSize.hint: Sets the size of the light point that precedes text display (in pixels)

allowHack.name: Allow Hacking
allowHack.hint: Allows players to use the HACK command to attempt administrator access

allowCerberus.name: Allow Cerberus Protocol
allowCerberus.hint: Allows players to activate the self-destruct protocol

cerberusDuration.name: Cerberus Protocol Duration
cerberusDuration.hint: Duration in minutes before self-destruct (1-60 minutes)

WELCOME ADMINISTRATOR
WHAT CAN I DO FOR YOU?
MOTHER.CerberusWarning:
!!! WARNING !!!
CERBERUS PROTOCOL ACTIVATED
SELF-DESTRUCT INITIATED

754.name: SPECIAL ORDER 754
754.description: Investigate any distress signal. All other considerations secondary. Crew expendable.

899.name: SPECIAL ORDER 899
899.description: Collect xenomorph specimens for biological weapons division. Maximum priority. Crew expendable.

931.name: SPECIAL ORDER 931
931.description: Contain any biological contamination. Quarantine protocols activated. No exceptions authorized.

937.name: SPECIAL ORDER 937
937.description: Protection of xenomorph specimens priority. Crew expendable.

939.name: SPECIAL ORDER 939
939.description: Return viable samples for analysis. Absolute confidentiality required. Crew expendable.

966.name: SPECIAL ORDER 966
966.description: Secure and preserve any non-human artifacts. Maximum priority. Crew expendable.

Cerberus.name: CERBERUS PROTOCOL
Cerberus.TimeRemaining: You have {time} before CERBERUS protocol activation.
Cerberus.description:
MAXIMUM SECURITY PROTOCOL ACTIVATED
SELF-DESTRUCT INITIALIZATION
IMMEDIATE EVACUATION RECOMMENDED
TIME REMAINING UNTIL DETONATION: 10:00

WARNING: THIS ACTION CANNOT BE UNDONE
Cerberus.warning:
!!! WARNING !!!
CERBERUS PROTOCOL ACTIVATED
SELF-DESTRUCT INITIATED
Cerberus.confirmation:
!!! WARNING !!!

YOU ARE ABOUT TO ACTIVATE THE CERBERUS PROTOCOL
THIS ACTION WILL TRIGGER THE STATION'S SELF-DESTRUCT
NO RETURN WILL BE POSSIBLE

CONFIRM ACTIVATION?
